bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
This lambda
fairseq/fairseq/criterions/ctc.py
Line 221 in 0bb7bc3
lambda meters: round(meters["_c_errors"].sum * 100.0 / meters["_c_total"].sum, 3)
throws TypeError: type Tensor doesn't define __round__ method if AverageMeter.sum returns torch.Tensor. Replacing round to safe_round from
fairseq/fairseq/logging/meters.py
Line 53 in 0bb7bc3
def safe_round(number, ndigits):
solve it. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
